text: I've been accepted as a 2022 LEADING fellow! I'll be working with Dr. Synatra Smith at Temple University's Scholars Studio
I chaired the panel 'Theorizing Care and the Digital' at SLSA 2021, and presented on my ongoing research into the infrastructures of homeless services
Alexandria Rayburn and I presented our research on social workers' use of Reddit at ASIST 2021
I'm excited to join the Center for Ethics, Society, and Computing as an affiliate researcher
